HOW TO INSTALL :
Extract the file into your Data Folder and check it on Skyrim launcher/Data Files
____________________________________________________________________________________________
INFORMATION :
ive been watching and playing this game alot so ive desided to change something
but to share it with you aswell!!! finally the update 2.0 is on featuring Markarth! 
Btw im changing alot of things in every city and not only on one (what i mean is 
that if i change on winterhold ill change some things in riverwood aswell or markarth)
____________________________________________________________________________________________
KNOWN BUGS : 
For Riverwood the npcs ive made can be killed without the guards help them .. + They are not sleeping anywere .. + the one npc is just watching around
Currently working on all of these!
author: sasisma
